ElementDescription: The NDAR Global Unique Identifier (GUID) for research subject
Subject ID how it's defined in lab/project
Date on which the interview/genetic test/sampling/imaging/biospecimen was completed. MM/DD/YYYY
Age in months at the time of the interview/test/sampling/imaging.
Notes: Age is rounded to chronological month. If the research participant is 15-days-old at time of interview, the appropriate value would be 0 months. If the participant is 16-days-old, the value would be 1 month.
M = Male; F = Female; O=Other; NR = Not reported

ElementDescription: My outward appearance represents my gender identity.
Notes: 1=Strongly disagree; 2=Somewhat disagree; 3=Neither agree nor disagree; 4=Somewhat agree; 5=Strongly agree; 99=N/A; 777= Prefer not to answer; 999=Not answered/Missing/Do not know

ElementDescription: I experience a sense of unity between my gender identity and my body.
Notes: 1=Strongly disagree; 2=Somewhat disagree; 3=Neither agree nor disagree; 4=Somewhat agree; 5=Strongly agree; 99=N/A; 999=Not answered/Missing

ElementDescription: My physical appearance adequately expresses my gender identity.
Notes: 1=Strongly disagree; 2=Somewhat disagree; 3=Neither agree nor disagree; 4=Somewhat agree; 5=Strongly agree; 99=N/A; 999=Not answered/Missing

ElementDescription: I am generally comfortable with how others perceive my gender identity when they look at me.
Notes: 1=Strongly disagree; 2=Somewhat disagree; 3=Neither agree nor disagree; 4=Somewhat agree; 5=Strongly agree; 99=N/A; 777= Prefer not to answer; 999=Not answered/Missing/Do not know

ElementDescription: My physical body represents my gender identity.
Notes: 1=Strongly disagree; 2=Somewhat disagree; 3=Neither agree nor disagree; 4=Somewhat agree; 5=Strongly agree; 99=N/A; 999=Not answered/Missing

ElementDescription: The way my body currently looks does not represent my gender identity. (Reverse Scored)
Notes: 1=Strongly disagree; 2=Somewhat disagree; 3=Neither agree nor disagree; 4=Somewhat agree; 5=Strongly agree; 99=N/A; 999=Not answered/Missing

ElementDescription: I am happy with the way my appearance expresses my gender identity.
Notes: 1=Strongly disagree; 2=Somewhat disagree; 3=Neither agree nor disagree; 4=Somewhat agree; 5=Strongly agree; 99=N/A; 999=Not answered/Missing

ElementDescription: I do not feel that my appearance reflects my gender identity. (Reverse Scored)
Notes: 1=Strongly disagree; 2=Somewhat disagree; 3=Neither agree nor disagree; 4=Somewhat agree; 5=Strongly agree; 99=N/A; 999=Not answered/Missing

ElementDescription: I feel that my mind and body are consistent with one another.
Notes: 1=Strongly disagree; 2=Somewhat disagree; 3=Neither agree nor disagree; 4=Somewhat agree; 5=Strongly agree; 99=N/A; 999=Not answered/Missing

ElementDescription: I am not proud of my gender identity. (Reverse Scored)
Notes: 1=Strongly disagree; 2=Somewhat disagree; 3=Neither agree nor disagree; 4=Somewhat agree; 5=Strongly agree; 99=N/A; 999=Not answered/Missing

ElementDescription: I am happy that I have the gender identity that I do.
Notes: 1=Strongly disagree; 2=Somewhat disagree; 3=Neither agree nor disagree; 4=Somewhat agree; 5=Strongly agree; 99=N/A; 999=Not answered/Missing

ElementDescription: I have accepted my gender identity.
Notes: 1=Strongly disagree; 2=Somewhat disagree; 3=Neither agree nor disagree; 4=Somewhat agree; 5=Strongly agree; 99=N/A; 999=Not answered/Missing
Mean average of tcs_1 thorough tcs_12; higher scores indicating a higher level of congruence
